pr_title: CB-8510: Fixing NPE when azure getCopyStatus returns with null value

timeline.bodyText: This can still throw NPE when the storage does not contain the image?
timeline.author: cegganesh84

timeline.message: CB-8510 Fixing NPE when azure getCopyStatus returns with null value
Omit image check if managed image is already there
